DOC.brief_summary: Effects of clopidogrel and clarithromycin on the oral disposition of sibutramine in healthy subjects
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Clopidogrel and Clarithromycin on the Oral Disposition of Sibutramine in Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: 1. Plasma concentrations of sibutramine and its two active metabolites after single oral dose of sibutramine were determined in Korean healthy male subjects with different CYP2B6 genotypes (CYP2B6*1/*1, *1/*6 and *6/*6), either alone or after four-day pretreatment with clopidogrel or clarithromycin.
DOC.criteria: must be healthy volunteer must not be under 18 years old
